00038 #define ZGP_INPUT_PACKET_COUNT (ZGP_DSTUB_BUFFERS_AMOUNT / 2)
00039 #define ZGP_OUTPUT_PACKET_COUNT  (ZGP_DSTUB_BUFFERS_AMOUNT - ZGP_INPUT_PACKET_COUNT)

00042                         Types section.
00043 ******************************************************************************/
00045 typedef struct PACK
00046 {
00047   ZGP_GpdfDataReq_t zgpDstubDataReq;
00048   MAC_DataReq_t macDataReq;
00049 #ifdef ZGP_SECURITY_ENABLE
00050   ZGP_Security_Key_t secKey;
00051   SSP_ZgpEncryptFrameReq_t zgpEncryptReq;
00052 #endif /* ZGP_SECURITY_ENABLE */
00053 } zgpOutputPacket_t;
00054 
00056 typedef struct PACK
00057 {
00058   struct
00059   {
00060     uint8_t *rxdFramePtr;
00061     uint8_t rxdFrameLength;
00062   } service;
00063   ZGP_LowDataInd_t zgpDataInd;
00064   zgpDstubSecResponseStatusCode_t secRspCode;
00065 #ifdef ZGP_SECURITY_ENABLE
00066   ZGP_Security_Key_t secKey;
00067   SSP_ZgpDecryptFrameReq_t zgpDecryptReq;
00068 #endif /* ZGP_SECURITY_ENABLE */
00069 } zgpInputPacket_t;
00070 
00071 typedef enum _ZgpPacketType_t
00072 {
00073   ZGP_UNKNOWN_PACKET = 0x0,
00075   ZGP_DSTUB_INPUT_DATA_PACKET = 0x1,
00077   ZGP_DSTUB_OUTPUT_DATA_PACKET = 0x2,
00078   ZGP_BUFFER_TYPE_LAST
00079 } zgpPacketType_t;
00080 
00081 typedef enum _ZgpPacketState_t
00082 {
00083   ZGP_PACKET_IDLE = 0x0,
00084   ZGP_PACKET_INPKT_MAINTENANCE_FRAME_PROCESSING = 0x1,
00085   ZGP_PACKET_INPKT_DATA_FRAME_PROCESSING = 0x2,
00086   ZGP_PACKET_INPKT_TO_PROCESS_FOR_RESPONSE = 0x3,
00087   ZGP_PACKET_INPKT_RESPONSE_SENDING_IN_PROCESS = 0x4,
00088   ZGP_PACKET_INPKT_INDICATION_TO_HIGHER_LAYER = 0x5,
00089   ZGP_PAKCET_INPKT_INDICATION_ON_HOLD = 0x6,
00090   ZGP_PACKET_INPKT_SECURITY_IN_PROCESS = 0x7,
00091   ZGP_PACKET_OUTPKT_IN_TXQUEUE = 0x8,
00092   ZGP_PACKET_OUTPKT_TX_IN_PROCESS = 0x9
00093 } zgpPacketState_t;
00094 
00096 typedef struct PACK
00097 {
00098   struct
00099   {
00100     void *next;
00101   }service;
00103   zgpPacketType_t type;
00104   zgpPacketState_t state;
00105   uint8_t macPayload[MAX_ZGP_MSDU_SIZE];
00106   union
00107   {
00109     zgpInputPacket_t in;
00110     zgpOutputPacket_t out;
00111   } pkt;
00112 } zgpPacket_t;
